activateButton.description: Text for the button that activates the force download mode.

addComponentLabel.description: Label for the rename component pills.

appDesc.message: Automatically organizes downloads into specific folders within the main Downloads folder.

autoOrganizeLabel.description: Label for the main toggle switch in the popup.

cancelEditButton.description: Button to cancel editing a rule.

clearHistoryButton.description: Button to clear the download history.

codesLabel.description: Label for the list of available format codes.

confirmClearHistory.message: Are you sure you want to delete the entire download history?

confirm_importOverwrite.message: This will replace ALL your current rules. Are you sure?

contextMenu_saveIn.description: The parent title for the context menu item.

customFormatPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the custom date format input.

customLabel.description: Label for the custom date format section.

dateFormatModalSubtitle.description: Subtitle for the date format builder modal.
dateFormatModalSubtitle.message: Create a custom format or choose a preset.

dateFormatModalTitle.description: Title of the date format builder modal.

deepScanLabel.description: Label for the deep scan checkbox.

deepScanTooltip.description: Tooltip for the deep scan checkbox in the on-demand organizer.
deepScanTooltip.message: If checked, it will include files in the search that no longer exist on disk (useful if you want to re-download them).

defaultCategoriesDesc.description: Description for the default categories section.
defaultCategoriesDesc.message: Uncheck a category to keep those files in the main Downloads folder (Custom Rules always have priority).

defaultCategoriesTitle.description: Title for the default categories section.

defaultCategoriesTooltip.description: Tooltip for the default categories section.
defaultCategoriesTooltip.message: Uncheck to stop organizing these specific file types automatically.

enableAutoOrganizeDesc.message: This is the master switch. If disabled, the extension will not modify your downloads.

enableAutoOrganizeLabel.description: Label for the main toggle in options.

enableContextMenuDesc.description: Description for the context menu toggle.
enableContextMenuDesc.message: Shows the 'Save in...' option when right-clicking on links, images, or videos.

enableContextMenuLabel.description: Label for the context menu toggle.

error_contextMenuDownload.description: Error message for a context menu download failure. $error$ is a placeholder.
error_contextMenuDownload.message: Could not start download from context menu: $error$

error_downloadInterrupted.description: Error message for an interrupted download. $filename$ is a placeholder.

error_importWrongFormat.message: The file does not have the expected rules format.

existingRulesDesc.description: Description for the existing rules list.
existingRulesDesc.message: Drag and drop the rules to change their priority (the first one has the highest priority).

existingRulesTitle.description: Title for the existing rules section.

feedback_errorCompleteFields.message: Please, complete the condition and the destination folder.

feedback_errorDeleteNoId.message: Cannot delete the rule because it has no ID.

feedback_errorFileNotExists.message: The file no longer exists on disk.

feedback_errorNotInHistory.message: The download is not in Chrome's history.

feedback_errorRuleNotFound.message: Error: Rule to edit not found.

feedback_errorUpdateNotFound.message: Error updating: original rule not found.

feedback_noHistoryResults.description: Message when history search is empty.

feedback_noRulesDefined.description: Message when the rules list is empty.

feedback_noRulesToExport.message: There are no rules to export.

feedback_noScanResults.description: Message when on-demand scan is empty.
feedback_noScanResults.message: No files matching your search were found.

feedback_organizationStarted.message: ‚úÖ Organization of $count$ file(s) has started. They will appear in your history.

feedback_selectAtLeastOneFile.message: Please, select at least one file to organize.

filterSearchFrom.description: Label for the start date filter.

filterSearchTo.description: Label for the end date filter.

folder_audio.description: Default folder name for audio files.

folder_code.description: Default folder name for code files.

folder_compressed.description: Default folder name for compressed files.

folder_documents.description: Default folder name for document files.

folder_images.description: Default folder name for image files.

folder_other.description: Default folder name for other files.

folder_pdfs.description: Default folder name for PDF files.

folder_programs.description: Default folder name for program files.

folder_spreadsheets.description: Default folder name for spreadsheet files.

folder_text.description: Default folder name for text files.

folder_videos.description: Default folder name for video files.

forceDownloadLabel.description: Label for the force download input field.

forceDownloadPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the force download input.

generalSettingsTitle.description: Title for the general settings section.

historyTitle.description: Title for the download history section.

insertButton.description: Button to insert the created date format.

label_dateComponent.description: Label for a date component in the rename builder. $format$ is a placeholder.

loadingHistory.description: Message shown while the download history is being loaded.

newCustomRuleTitle.description: Title for the new rule form section.

notificationSuggestionMessage.description: Message for a rule suggestion notification.
notificationSuggestionMessage.message: We've noticed you download '.$ext$' files from '$domain$' into the '$folder$' folder. Would you like to automate this?

notificationSuggestionTitle.description: Title for a rule suggestion notification.

notification_braveSetupMessage.description: Instructions for Brave users to get the extension to work correctly.
notification_braveSetupMessage.message: For automatic organization, go to Settings > Downloads and disable 'Ask where to save each file before downloading'.

notification_braveSetupTitle.description: Title for the one-time notification for Brave users.

notification_ruleCreatedMessage.description: Message of the notification confirming a rule was created. $domain$ is a placeholder.
notification_ruleCreatedMessage.message: A rule for files from '$domain$' has been created.

notification_ruleCreatedTitle.description: Title of the notification confirming a rule was created.

notificationsDesc.message: Choose when you want to receive desktop notifications.

onDemandOrganizerDesc.message:
Scans your entire Chrome download history. You can use date filters to find specific files. The tool will show you all found files so you can decide which ones to organize using your current rules.
Important: This action will create an organized copy of the files. You must delete the originals manually.

onDemandOrganizerTitle.description: Title for the on-demand organizer section.

openFolderButton.description: Button to open the containing folder of a download.

openFolderTooltip.description: Tooltip for the button that opens the download's folder.

openSettingsTooltip.description: Tooltip for the settings button in the popup.

optionsHeaderSubtitle.description: Subtitle on the options page header.
optionsHeaderSubtitle.message: All files will be saved within your default Downloads folder.

optionsHeaderTitle.description: Main title on the options page.

optionsPageTitle.description: Title of the options HTML page.

organizeSelectedButton.description: Button to organize the selected files from a scan.

placeholder_urlExample.description: Placeholder for a URL input field.

popupTitle.description: Title displayed in the popup window.

popup_downloadCount.description: Text showing the total number of organized downloads. $count$ is a placeholder.

popup_forceActiveText.description: Text showing where the next forced download will go. $folder$ is a placeholder.

popup_noHistory.description: Message when the history list is empty.

presetsLabel.description: Label for the preset date formats section.

previewLabel.description: Label for the date format preview.

prompt_enterFreeText.message: Enter the free text (you can use '_' or '-' as separators):

quickAccessTitle.description: Title for the floating folder widget.

redownloadTooltip.description: Tooltip for the button that re-downloads a file.

renamePreviewPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the empty rename pattern preview area.
renamePreviewPlaceholder.message: The new file name will appear here. Add components to start.

ruleConditionLabel.description: Step 1 label in the rule builder.
ruleConditionLabel.message: 1. If the download meets this condition:

ruleFolderLabel.description: Step 2 label in the rule builder.

ruleRenameDesc.message: To add dates to your files, use the + Date/Time component.

ruleRenameLabel.description: Step 3 label in the rule builder.
ruleRenameLabel.message: 3. Optionally, rename the file (drag blocks to reorder):

ruleValuePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the rule condition value.

scanHistoryButton.description: Button to start the on-demand scan.

searchAgainButton.description: Button to perform a new scan.

searchHistoryPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the history search input.
searchHistoryPlaceholder.message: Search file by name, folder, or date...

selectAllLabel.description: Label for the select all checkbox in scan results.

themeDesc.message: Choose between light, dark, or automatic mode based on your system.

title_editingRule.description: Title for the form when editing a rule.

title_scanResults.description: Title for scan results. $count$ is a placeholder.

tooltip_removeComponent.description: Tooltip for the remove button on a rename component.

unknownSite.description: Fallback text for unknown website in filename.

updateRuleButton.description: Button to update an existing rule.

viewRecentHistory.description: Label for the collapsible history section in the popup.

widgetAlertNoFiles.message: This folder appears in your history but has no associated files.

widgetConfirmForget.message:
Are you sure you want to forget the folder "$folder$"?

It will disappear from this panel (files on your PC are not deleted).

widgetConfirmGhost.message:
The folder "$folder$" exists in your history, but you have deleted ALL the files it contained.

Do you want to move it to 'Hidden' to clean up your view?

widgetConfirmLostFile.message:
The file used to open "$folder$" no longer exists.

Do you want to remove this folder from Quick Access?

widgetMsgNoActive.description: Message when the widget is empty.

widgetMsgTrashEmpty.description: Message when the hidden tab is empty.
